parameters.content:
# üì¨ Personal Daily Tech Newsletter

**What it does:**
Automatically curates and emails a personalized daily newsletter with the latest tech news, tools, and products tailored to your interests.

**How it works:**
1. Triggers daily at 9 AM
2. Fetches RSS feeds from your favorite tech sources
3. Uses Google Gemini AI to filter and curate based on your interests
4. Sends a beautifully formatted newsletter to your inbox

**Customize:**
- Change RSS sources in the "Set" nodes
- Modify keywords/interests in "Analyze document" node
- Update your email address in "Send email" node
- Adjust schedule time in trigger node

## üìÖ Daily Trigger
Scheduled to run every day at 9:00 AM

## üì∞ RSS Feed Sources
Define which RSS feeds to monitor for tech news and tools

## üîÑ RSS Feed Processing
Split, loop through feeds in batches, and fetch content

## üì¶ Combine & Convert
Merge all feeds and convert to CSV for AI

## ü§ñ AI Curation

Google Gemini analyzes content and selects the top items based on your interests.

**Note:** Change the keywords in the **Analyze Document** node‚Äôs text input prompt according to your interests.

## üìß Newsletter Delivery

Format and send the personalized newsletter.

**Note:**
Add **SMTP credentials**, **sender**, and **receiver information**.

parameters.content:
**Note:**
I have used **two different sources of interest** (News and Tools). 
That‚Äôs why there are **two separate lists**. Please make changes according to your approach or workflow.
